abstract: A chef who has used many Asian flavors gets back to his Italian and German roots.
snippet: A chef who has used many Asian flavors gets back to his Italian and German roots.
lead_paragraph: Early next year, Harold Dieterle will step away from the Asian kitchen for which he has become known at Perilla and Kin Shop and open the Marrow in a new hotel in downtown Brooklyn.

headline.main: Harold Dieterle Will Turn to Europe for the Marrow in Brooklyn
